DOC.brief_title: A Case Collection Study Digital Breast Tomosynthesis ( DBT ) Using Senographe Essential
DOC.criteria: Ability provide write informed consent legally authorize representative provide write informed consent Female subject 40 year age old Subject history symptom and/or physical sign breast cancer side target breast Subject underwent routine FullField Digital Mammography ( FFDM ) show one abnormality , include calcification , refer diagnostic workup within 4 week Subject surgically sterile ( must documentation bilateral oophorectomy and/or document hysterectomy ) , postmenopausal ( must documentation cessation menses great one year ) , childbearing potential , documented negative urine pregnancy test within 4 week require .
